name: SurgicalProceduresForImplantingPocketedDevices
title: Surgical Procedures for Implanting Pocketed Devices
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a pocketed device implantation surgical procedure.  These procedures include implantation of drug infusion pumps, pacemakers or implantable defibrillators.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a pocketed device implantation surgical procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a surgical procedure to implant a pocketed device such as a drug infusion pump, pacemakers or implantable defibrillators.   Codes used are to be ICD9CM codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
